metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2313 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
auth_login.php in Cacti before 0.8.8g allows remote authenticated users whouse web authentication to bypass intended access restrictions by logging inas a user not in the cacti database.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2313` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cacti - 0.8.8f+ds1-4ubuntu4.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cacti package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.8.8f+ds1-4ubuntu4.16.04.2').
